xdm:masterProductName: Lahara Single Hole Single-Handle Bathroom Faucet with Metal Drain Assembly in Stainless
xdm:masterProductDescription: Just like ocean waves, the one-piece curves and sleek lines of this Lahara Single Hole 1-Handle High Arc Bathroom Faucet in Stainless make a lasting impression. Delta's exclusive DIAMOND seal technology uses a valve with a tough diamond coating to bring you a faucet built to last up to five million uses.
